itemDescription: British comic book artist and writer

wikipedia_page.main: Ian Culbard, professionally known as I. N. J. Culbard, is a British comic artist, writer and animator.

response: *At The Mountains Of Madness: A Graphic Novel, Ian Culbard (Selfmadehero)

** You Look Like Death: Tales from the Umbrella Academy #1–6 (co-writer Shaun Simon, artist Ian Culbard, letterer Nate Piekos, cover artist Gabriel Bá, Dark Horse, 2020–2021)
